allBlogPosts.title: Apple news, fresh job titles and tackling loneliness with tech

allBlogPosts.meta_description: This week, we've been reading about Apple's announcements, the ways in which tech can tackle loneliness, subtle logo references and more.

allBlogPosts.title: Why don’t you have a monorepo?
allBlogPosts.author: nathalie.goepel@red-badger.com
allBlogPosts.meta_description: After using it for over two years here’s why I strongly believe using a monorepo should be a key part of your tech strategy, and how adopting this approach fully will result in fewer barriers in the software development lifecycle.
allBlogPosts.post_body: You’ve probably heard that Facebook, Twitter, Google, Microsoft, and other tech industry behemoths keep their entire codebase, all services, applications and tools in a single huge repository – a monorepo.
allBlogPosts.post_list_content: You’ve probably heard that Facebook, Twitter, Google, Microsoft, and other tech industry behemoths keep their entire codebase, all services, applications and tools in a single huge repository – a monorepo.
allBlogPosts.post_summary: You’ve probably heard that Facebook, Twitter, Google, Microsoft, and other tech industry behemoths keep their entire codebase, all services, applications and tools in a single huge repository – a monorepo.
